item.title: Document the highway hierarchies mobile routing
item.description:
From Frank.Vi...@googlemail.com on September 28, 2010 14:45:55
create a getting started article for library users. 1a. how to create a highway hierarchies binary file 1b. how to use the HHRouter -> 2 create a sample application with minimal lines of code. summarize the approach (short version) document the routing binary file
to be done in the end of november
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=33
